title: e-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Self-Directed Learning Capacity Development for Lifelong Learning Orientation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic learning motivation and adaptability to digital environments
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can compose three or more statements explaining the importance and personal value of lifelong learning
Learners establish self-directed learning plans twice weekly and achieve an 80% or higher implementation rate
Learners complete 90% or more of LMS-based learning materials in smartphone environments while maintaining self-directed learning attitudes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
